A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disrespectful to the original Space Opera hero: Luke Skywalker. The writing appears to be a poor first draft that was never revised or revisited. Amazing effects do little today to hold up a forced politically correct narrative where minority characters are pushed into the foreground despite developing no distinguishing characteristics or history. Numerous moments are stolen directly from Episode 5 & 6 including Hoth battle\, Luke and Vader redemption convo\, super villain overconfidence and mocking hero scene\, and a poor version of a reluctant Jedi master training a keen apprentice and dark side cave scene. Very lazy work catered to mindless buffoons who enjoy watching explosions and lightsabers move around. Probably the most lazy Star Wars ever made because it adds literally nothing original to the franchise and has too many cheesy near death moments which have become a staple of braindead millennial cinema.
